name: Map to Address
author: Sevengits

sections.description:
Map to Address helps customers to fetch their current address from the map and autofill in the address field. This is reverse geocoding plugin.

Woocommerce Map to Address plugin substitutes the traditional order placing experience on your checkout page.
By activating the Delivery Location Map picker plugin, it shrinks the old filling form with a simple map. When a customer adjusts their location in the map, the address will be automatically fetched into the address field.
Also, customers can save multiple addresses with a label(premium version). It will be helpful to choose from the saved address while checking out.

Note: This plugin won’t work with blocked checkout.Works on classic checkout

Free Version Feature

  • Fetches current location and autofill address details
  • Autofill address from map
  • Clean User Interface
  • Theme compatible design
  • Translation ready
  • Easy to configure
  • Translation ready
  • Early access to new updates
  • Customer support via WordPress support
  • Easy to operate by end user

Premium Features

  • All features of Free Version
  • Fetches current location and autofill address details.
  • Save multiple locations for delivery
  • Autofill address from map
  • Autofill shipping address plugin
  • Choose delivery address from saved addresses.
  • Early access to new updates
  • Customer support via email
  • Save multiple address plugin
  • pick address from google map plugin

sections.installation:
1. Upload map-to-address.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:

  • Improvement: Compatible with woocommerce 8.4 (may be not work with blocked checkout)
  • Fix: Styling issue of mobile view is fixed.(credits goes to Марк Федоренко)

  • Improvement: Compatible with WordPress 6.4

sections.reviews:
Convenient checkout

By hkayali on April 14, 2021

I'm using this Plugin to populate the address fields in WooCommerce checkout. Very convenient for customers to enter their address. And very accurate for the shop owner to deliver accurately.

short_description: Customers can mark their location  on google map and address will be automatically populated.
